name: Holes the movie the game
description:
Holes Movie the Game is a project produced entirely by SimmeredEggsStudios
for the Brackeys 2020 Game Jam.

Developers: ImmortalityBH and FantacticHD

Release Date 2/22/20 Version 1.0

Gameplay: Protect the last copy of The Holes Movie from oncoming
waves of Karens and Satans. Use your CDs, candy shotgun, and soda grenades
to give them hell. Refill your CDs by going up to a rack. Refill your 
shotgun ammo by picking up the fallen candy from enemies. Also, refill your
soda grenades by bumping into the Dr. Goop soda machine.
